chatMessages.message: Welcome to Spring CTF 2026! Good luck to all teams!
Server issues have been resolved. All challenges are now accessible.
Is the web challenge server down?
Working fine for me. Try refreshing?
TeamRocket scored first blood on 'SQL Injection'!
Can someone give a hint on the crypto challenge?
Read the description carefully, the key is in the encoding method.
New forensics challenge 'Hidden Data' has been released!
CyberNinjas scored first blood on 'Buffer Overflow'!
GG! That was a tough one!

challenges.name: SQL Injection
challenges.description: Find and exploit the SQL injection vulnerability to retrieve the admin password.
challenges.author: admin

hints.content: Look for input fields that interact with the database.
Try using UNION SELECT to extract data.

challenges.name: XSS Hunter
challenges.description: Exploit a cross-site scripting vulnerability to steal the admin's session cookie.
challenges.author: security_team

hints.content: Check all input fields for sanitization.

challenges.name: Authentication Bypass + Authentication Bypass
challenges.description: Bypass the authentication mechanism to access the admin panel.
challenges.author: admin

challenges.name: Caesar Cipher
challenges.description: Decrypt the message encrypted with a simple Caesar cipher.
challenges.author: crypto_master

challenges.name: RSA Weaknesses
challenges.description: Exploit weak RSA parameters to decrypt the flag.
challenges.author: crypto_master

hints.content: Check if the modulus is small enough to factor.

challenges.name: AES Madness
challenges.description: Break the AES encryption by analyzing the implementation flaws.
challenges.author: crypto_master

challenges.name: Buffer Overflow
challenges.description: Overflow the buffer to overwrite the return address and execute arbitrary code.
challenges.author: binary_expert

hints.content: Use a debugger to find the offset.

challenges.name: Format String
challenges.description: Exploit the format string vulnerability to leak memory and gain control.
challenges.author: binary_expert

challenges.name: ROP Chain
challenges.description: Build a return-oriented programming chain to bypass protections.
challenges.author: binary_expert

challenges.name: Network Analysis
challenges.description: Analyze the network traffic to find the hidden flag.
challenges.author: forensics_pro

challenges.name: Image Steganography
challenges.description: Extract the hidden message from the image file.
challenges.author: forensics_pro

hints.content: Try checking the LSB of the image pixels.

challenges.name: Memory Dump
challenges.description: Analyze the memory dump to recover the encryption key.
challenges.author: forensics_pro

challenges.name: Command Injection
challenges.description: Exploit the command injection to execute system commands.
challenges.author: misc_admin

challenges.name: OSINT Challenge
challenges.description: Use open-source intelligence techniques to find the target's location.
challenges.author: misc_admin

challenges.name: Reverse Engineering
challenges.description: Reverse engineer the binary to understand its functionality and find the flag.
challenges.author: misc_admin
